reviewText: Video productions is amateur.  Compilation into a DVD is terrible. You can't hit a button to play all. I'm not sure if I learned anything useful. Rather than instructing, it just shows several girls competing.  None of them has a flawless performance. Typed narrater focuses more on what they do wrong rather than right.  No explanation as to how to mimic any of the walking styles...and no direction as to what part of the walking styles are correct versus incorrect.
